$comment: All of the attributes for the Protocol object can be found here.
description: The properties of the Protocol object.

name.description: The name given to the Protocol.

version.description: The version letter of the protocol

examples: Sequencing using PCR templates and 20mM primers

steps.description: The method used to administer the protocol
examples: BDT sequencing V 3.1 using PCR templates revised July 19, 2005 ND

reference.description: Reference of where the protocol was adapted from.
examples: Adapted from Mollar et al., 1992, modified by Dave Chitty, Kasia Dadej

forwardPrimerConcentration.description: The concentration of the forward primer

reversePrimerConcentration.description: The concentration of the reverse primer

reactionMixVolume.description: The volume of the reaction mix

reactionMixVolumePerTube.description: The volume of the reaction mix per tube of the protocol

lastModified.description: Last modified date of the protocol.
